verses.verse: My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>steadfast,<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%> I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> and I will make <S%H2167>music<s%> with my <S%H3519>soul.<s%>
<S%H5782>Wake<s%> <S%H5035>up,<s%> harp and <S%H3658>lyre!<s%> I will <S%H5782>wake<s%> up the <S%H7837>dawn.<s%>
I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, among the <S%H5971>nations.<s%> I will sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to you among the <S%H3816>peoples.<s%>
For your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> above the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%> Your <S%H571>faithfulness<s%> reaches to the <S%H7834>skies.<s%>
Be <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> above the <S%H8064>heavens!<s%> Let your <S%H3519>glory<s%> be over all the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
That your <S%H3039>beloved<s%> may be <S%H2502>delivered,<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> with your right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and answer <S%H6030>us.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> from his <S%H6944>sanctuary:<s%> "In <S%H5937>triumph,<s%> I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and measure <S%H4058>out<s%> the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth.<s%>
<S%H1568>Gilead<s%> is <S%H4519>mine.<s%> Manasseh is <S%H669>mine.<s%> Ephraim also is my <S%H4581>helmet.<s%> <S%H7218><s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is my <S%H2710>scepter.<s%>
<S%H4124>Moab<s%> is my <S%H7366>wash<s%> <S%H7993>pot.<s%> I will toss my <S%H5275>sandal<s%> on <S%H123>Edom.<s%> I will <S%H7321>shout<s%> over <S%H6429>Philistia.<s%>"
Who will <S%H2986>bring<s%> me into the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>city?<s%> Who has <S%H5148>led<s%> me to <S%H123>Edom?<s%>
<S%H2186>Haven't<s%> you rejected <S%H430>us,<s%> God? You <S%H3318>don't<s%> go forth, <S%H430>God,<s%> with our <S%H6635>armies.<s%>
<S%H3051>Give<s%> us <S%H5833>help<s%> against the <S%H6862>enemy,<s%> for the <S%H8668>help<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H7723>vain.<s%>
Through <S%H430>God,<s%> we will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly.<s%> For it is he who will tread <S%H947>down<s%> our <S%H6862>enemies.<s%>
